overview:
Alex Andrei is co-founder of Skillful Communications, a company that provides career coaching and training for individuals, and training & development consulting for organizations.

Skillful has also developed Big Interview, an online job interview training system that helps clients ace their interviews and land job offers.

Alex has more than 10 years of experience in management roles at top commercial real estate firms in New York City. He is also an instructor for the American Management Association specializing in sales, marketing and technology.
